DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor find good way treat cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study sample young patient malignant germ cell tumor progression .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Biomarkers Samples From Younger Patients With Malignant Germ Cell Tumor Progression
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Explore inter-tumoral heterogeneity DNA methylation tumor histology . - Determine genomic methylation pattern tumor . - Correlate methylation pattern tumor histology clinical characteristic . - Carry exome capture massively parallel sequence select germ cell tumor ( GCTs ) match normal tissue . - Perform exome capture Solexa sequencing select set GCTs . - Validate candidate mutation independent set tumor . - Determine expression profile mRNAs , lincRNAs microRNAs tumor use RNA Seq . OUTLINE : Archived blood tumor tissue sample analyze genomic methylation pattern , exome capture sequencing , candidate mutation methylation-specific PCR technique , single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) array , Solexa sequence method . Results validate use pyrosequencing assay primer-extension assay . Methylation pattern also associate patient 's tumor histology clinical data .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Tumor blood specimens patient register Children Oncology Group ( COG ) Germ Cell Tumor Protocols , study site nonCOG patient , include Children 's Medical Center , Dallas DanaFarber Cancer Institute , Boston Patients ' clinical data PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
